mapper.insert: INSERT INTO timers (user_id, subject_id, focus_minutes, break_minutes, start_at) VALUES (#{timer.userId}, #{timer.subjectId}, #{timer.focusMinutes}, #{timer.breakMinutes}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE timers SET end_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND end_at IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM timers WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND end_at IS NULL ORDER BY start_at DESC LIMIT 1
